parameters.guess_1,guess_2,guess_3:
The different guesses (in order) for what
the mystery spice was.
parameters.correct_1,correct_2,correct_3:
An integer whether the guess was
correct (1) or wrong (0).
parameters.baker: A character string with a given name or nickname.

title: Spice Test
description:
Description
Results of a knowledge test from Junior Bake Off (Series 2, Episode 14).
format:
A data frame with 4 rows representing baker results from the
spice-based knowledge test and 7 variables:
